      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DecoderConfig DecoderConfig.and()
      Syntactic sugar.
      DecoderConfig DecoderConfig.contentDecoders(DecoderConfig.ContentDecoder contentDecoder, DecoderConfig.ContentDecoder... additionalContentDecoders)
      Specify the content decoders that will be presented to the server when making a request (using the Accept-Encoding header).
      static DecoderConfig DecoderConfig.decoderConfig() 
      DecoderConfig DecoderConfig.defaultContentCharset(Charset charset)
      Specify the default charset of the content in the response that's assumed if no charset is explicitly specified in the response.
      DecoderConfig DecoderConfig.defaultContentCharset(String charset)
      Specify the default charset of the content in the response that's assumed if no charset is explicitly specified in the response.
      DecoderConfig RestAssuredConfig.getDecoderConfig() 
      DecoderConfig DecoderConfig.noContentDecoders()
      Specify that no content decoders should be used by REST Assured.
      DecoderConfig DecoderConfig.useNoWrapForInflateDecoding(boolean nowrap)
      If the parameter 'nowrap' is true then the ZLIB header and checksum fields will not be used.
      DecoderConfig DecoderConfig.with()
      Syntactic sugar.
